articles.title: Katrina Kaif, Radhika Merchant Pose With Orry in Inside Pics From a B'Day Party - The Quint
articles.description: Isha Ambani hosted a star-studded party for the first birthday of her twins Aadiya and Krishna at the Jio World Centre in Mumbai on 18 November. The party was attended by several Bollywood celebrities including Katrina Kaif and Radhika Merchant.
